arguments.name: Dark Mode Feature Implementation
arguments.description: Project to manage the development and implementation of a dark mode feature for our app.

arguments.name: Implement Dark Mode Feature
arguments.problem_statement: Develop and integrate a dark mode feature into our app, ensuring it adheres to design guidelines and provides a seamless user experience. This includes theming for UI components, icons, and text contrast adjustments.
arguments.success_criteria:
1. Dark mode toggle is functional and accessible.
2. All UI components (buttons, inputs, navigation) adapt correctly to dark theme.
3. Text and icon contrast meet accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG AA).
4. No visual regressions in the app when switching between light and dark modes.
5. Performance impact is minimal, with no noticeable slowdowns or rendering issues.
arguments.description: This workunit tracks the implementation of a dark mode feature for our app. It involves frontend development, theming, testing, and ensuring compatibility across devices and browsers.

results.task_name: Break down a feature into tasks

arguments.name: Implement User Notifications
arguments.problem_statement: Design and implement a user notification system for workunit updates. This includes backend logic for triggering notifications, frontend UI for displaying notifications, and integration with the Workunit platform.
arguments.success_criteria: A fully functional notification system that sends real-time or near-real-time notifications to users when workunits are updated (e.g., status changes, comments added). The system should support email and in-app notifications, allow users to mark notifications as read/unread, and be thoroughly tested and documented.
arguments.description: This workunit covers the end-to-end implementation of user notifications for workunit updates. It includes designing the notification system, implementing backend and frontend components, testing, deployment, documentation, and monitoring.
